content: of the first colour followed by two each of the next two all corners are worked as double_crochet 2ch double_crochet change colour with a slip stitch after joining to the first corner of last round after round 3 instructions are for one side only all double_crochet stitches on the sides are worked into back loops only trebles are worked into the front loop of the stitch two row below make 4 chain and join with slip_stitch into ring round 1 3ch double_crochet 2ch x 3 slip_stitch to first corner space round 2 double_crochet all round 1 st per side round 3 double_crochet all round 3 sts per side round 4 2dc treble_crochet 2dc 5 sts round 5 2 2dc treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet 2dc 7 sts round 6 2dc treble_crochet 3dc treble_crochet 2dc 9 sts round 7 2dc treble_crochet 2dc x 3 11 sts round 8 3 5dc treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet 5dc 13 sts round 9 2dc treble_crochet twice 3dc treble_crochet 2dc twice 15 sts round 10 8dc treble_crochet 8dc 17 sts round 11 4 2dc treble_crochet x 3 double_crochet treble_crochet 2dc x 3 19 sts round 12 double_crochet all round 21 sts round 13 2dc treble_crochet 3dc treble_crochet 2dc x 3 23 sts round 14 4dc treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet 4dc x 3 25 sts round 15 4dc treble_crochet 3dc treble_crochet 2dc treble_crochet x 2 3dc treble_crochet 4dc 27 sts round 16 miss 1 28dc through both loops 30 stitches per side + corners © frankie brown 2022 19
